replies.body: THANKS ALOT RIOT {{champion:122}} DUMB FUCKING DECISION ONCE AGAIN

Why the fuck was the decision to release everything over 6 days even made?
And why did they make such a big deal of the countdown before the update if not everything was gonna be released in one go
The countdown doesnt mean shit then
How fucking stupid do you have to be to think thats a good idea

The countdown was to the start of the ranked season, which for many people is highly anticipated.

The staggered release is precisely so that everything isn't dropped at once. Those that hardcore ranked at season start but also want to play ARURF, have a chance to do both. People have the chance to get back into the ranked swing before a new champ gets thrown into the mix. People have a chance to digest a crapton of new information in smaller more manageable chunks. Each release gets it's own spotlight and appreciation rather than some things getting shoved behind everything else. Etc, etc.

This issue goes back to Riot wasting the longest preseason we've had on non-existent changes. And then dumping a bunch of pretty huge changes right at season start.
